main_definition: Dust refers to tiny particles of earth or waste matter, often found in the air and settling on surfaces.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To clean by removing dust from a surface
meanings_and_examples.example: She dusted off the old bookshelf before placing the books back.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Particles of fine, dry matter floating in the air or deposited on surfaces
meanings_and_examples.example: The sunlight shone through the window and scattered the dust particles across the room.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A colloquial expression indicating a small amount or degree
meanings_and_examples.example: Just a little dusting of flour on the pancake mix, please.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic phrase referring to ignoring minor issues or problems
meanings_and_examples.example: Don't sweat the small stuff; just keep it clean and move forward.
